name: Discord Nitro (Full)

long_description: Enjoy the complete features of Discord Nitro with Boost. Choose between a trial or full-length subscription. Fast delivery and easy setup guaranteed.

name: Discord Nitro (Basic)
description: Get the full version of Discord Nitro at an affordable price for eligible accounts.
long_description: If your Discord account has never used Nitro, you can get the full version at the lowest rate. Ideal for first-time Nitro users.
